subject: Pedals and peripherals
description_text:
Hello from Finland!



My company builds customized high-end-sims for customers in Finland. I am looking for new pedal sets for test and to sell with sim rigs.

Couple of questions.

Is it possible to make an order without VAT? I have valid VAT-number for my company.

Do you ship from outside of Great Britain? There is a tax issue with shipping from GB to Finland.



I am currently planning to buy 2 sets of pedals, shifters (seq) and handbrakes for my newest builds.



Best regards,

Timo Pohja

TA-Solutions Oy

Finland

conversations.body_text: Hi Timo Pohja,  We can ship from our Germany warehouse, and EU countries normally do not need to pay customs duties/import taxes. You can leave a note on your order saying “Ship from Germany”.
